name: Young Wasteland Dragon
speed: walk 40 ft., burrow 20 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 70 ft.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The dragon makes three attacks. one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

action.name: Warped Energy Breath (Recharge 6)
text: The dragon blasts warped arcane energy in a 40-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 (11d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
